EmailTemplate.description: Termination letter send to SLava Troendle
EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA QN Termination Letter EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Termination Letter - QN Contract ({!Qualification__c.Reference_Id__c})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Slava, Please find attached a termination letter for {!Account.BillingCountry}.<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Thanks to have it signed and posted and keep me informed.
Kind regards,
{!Qualification__c.Owner__c}
